mapper.select: select riqi, sum(case when tizhong <= 39 then 1 else 0 end) as 瘦, sum(case when tizhong >= 40 and tizhong <= 49 then 1 else 0 end) as 偏瘦, sum(case when tizhong >= 50 and tizhong <= 69 then 1 else 0 end) as 中等, sum(case when tizhong >= 70 and tizhong <= 79 then 1 else 0 end) as 偏胖, sum(case when tizhong >= 80 then 1 else 0 end) as 肥胖 from jiankangxinxi 1=1 ${ew.sqlSegment} group by riqi

select riqi, sum(case when xueya <= 59 then 1 else 0 end) as 低, sum(case when xueya >= 60 and xueya <= 79 then 1 else 0 end) as 偏低, sum(case when xueya >= 79 and xueya <= 119 then 1 else 0 end) as 正常, sum(case when xueya >= 120 and xueya <= 149 then 1 else 0 end) as 偏高, sum(case when xueya >= 149 then 1 else 0 end) as 高 from jiankangxinxi 1=1 ${ew.sqlSegment} group by riqi

select riqi, sum(case when xinlv <= 59 then 1 else 0 end) as 低, sum(case when xinlv >= 60 and xinlv <= 100 then 1 else 0 end) as 正常, sum(case when xinlv >= 100 then 1 else 0 end) as 高 from jiankangxinxi 1=1 ${ew.sqlSegment} group by riqi
